entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low zero.
